document.title: Hot Topic: Legislation Clarifies and Simplifies E-Commerce Procedures for Tennessee Municipalities
document.abstract: The 2001 legislative session resulted in several changes that affect electronic business in Tennessee. This hot topic highlights some of the more important changes.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#73
